description:
Hangetsu`s wish has both made Yuuhi stronger and made him a target for Mikazuki while the rest of the Beast Knights are brought together.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Amamiya Yuuhi and the Beast Knights (Part 1)
Amamiya Yuuhi to Kemono no Kishidan (Zenpen)
Yûhi Amamiya et les chevaliers animaux (partie 1)
雨宮夕日と獣の騎士団 (前編)
